ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Query NCBI Entrez and retrieve PubMed records in XML or text format. Process PubMed records by extracting and aggregating data from selected fields. A large number of records can be easily downloaded via this simple-to-use interface to the NCBI PubMed API.

Query NCBI Entrez and retrieve PubMed records in XML or text format. Process PubMed records by extracting and aggregating data from selected fields. A large number of records can be easily downloaded via this simple-to-use interface to the NCBI PubMed API.

name: r-easypubmed
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "3.1.6" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-easypubmed
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/easyPubMed_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/easyPubMed/easyPubMed_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 1a20aca60484e4100736eec6bc6cf6a790ce0576f4177114d70b1599662baa29

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-rlang
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-rlang

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('easyPubMed')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('easyPubMed')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://www.data-pulse.com/dev_site/easypubmed/
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Query NCBI Entrez and retrieve PubMed records in XML or text format. Process PubMed records by extracting and aggregating data from selected fields. A large number of records can be easily downloaded via this simple-to-use interface to the NCBI PubMed API.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
